data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 2, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a Valencia throw-in in Villarreal's half.
Throw-in Valencia.
In the minute 5, Villarreal have been awarded a penalty...
Paco Alcacer smashes in a penalty at Estadio de la Ceramica. The score is now 1-0.
Dani Parejo for Villarreal gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 9, Valencia have a goal kick.
Villarreal to take a throw-in in Valencia territory.
Free kick for Valencia in the half of Villarreal.
In the minute 12, Vicente Iborra (Villarreal) has received a first yellow card.
Daniel Wass (Valencia) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal kick for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Villarreal in the half of Valencia.
Moi Gomez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Villarreal.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Valencia in their own half.
In Villarreal Villarreal drive forward through Dani Parejo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Villarreal push forward at Estadio de la Ceramica and Dani Parejo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Valencia defence.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the away team in Villarreal.
Valencia's Carlos Soler breaks free at Estadio de la Ceramica. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Villarreal goal kick.
In the minute 21, Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Villarreal a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Villarreal.
Can Valencia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Villarreal's half?
In the minute 26, Free kick Valencia.
Goncalo Guedes for Valencia drives towards goal at Estadio de la Ceramica. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Villarreal's Alfonso Pedraza gets in a shot on goal at Estadio de la Ceramica. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 29, Villarreal have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 33, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Valencia.
Valencia push upfield and Mouctar Diakhaby gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Villarreal defence.
Corner awarded to Villarreal.
In the minute 36, Maxi Gomez (Valencia) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Valencia.
Goal! Goncalo Guedes equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
In the minute 37, That's a fine assist from Carlos Soler.
Free kick in a good position for Villarreal!
In Villarreal Villarreal attack through Paco Alcacer. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
Valencia to take a throw-in in Villarreal territory.
Carlos Soler (Valencia) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 44, Villarreal have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Important block from the Valencia defence as Manu Trigueros fires in a strike for Villarreal.
Goal kick for Valencia at Estadio de la Ceramica.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Villarreal.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a Villarreal throw-in in Valencia's half.
In the minute 48, Ball safe as Villarreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Valencia drive upfield and Alex Blanco gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Villarreal defender.
Corner awarded to Valencia.
In the minute 52, In Villarreal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Alfonso Pedraza (Villarreal) gets a yellow card.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 53, The away team replace Alex Blanco with Denis Cheryshev.
Valencia have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Valencia's Goncalo Guedes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 55, Villarreal have a goal kick.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Valencia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Villarreal's half?
In the minute 60, Valencia have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Valencia a goal kick.
Moi Gomez of Villarreal gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 62, Goal kick for Valencia at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Can Villarreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valencia's half?
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
In the minute 64, Unai Emery is making the team's first substitution at Estadio de la Ceramica with Francis Coquelin replacing Manu Trigueros.
Takefusa Kubo is replacing Samuel Chukwueze for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Villarreal are pushing forward but Mario Gaspar's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 65, Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Valencia a goal kick.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Valencia have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Ball goes out of play for a Villarreal goal kick.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
Dani Parejo is on target to give Villarreal a 2-1 advantage.
In the minute 69, Takefusa Kubo with an assist there.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Villarreal.
Villarreal have a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Takefusa Kubo (Villarreal) has received a yellow card from Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Jose Luis Gaya is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Villarreal in the half of Valencia.
Moi Gomez (Villarreal) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Valencia.
Jose Luis Gaya has recovered and rejoins the match in Villarreal.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
In the minute 79, Valencia push upfield but Carlos Del Cerro Grande quickly pulls them for offside.
Carlos Bacca is on a sub for Paco Alcacer for Villarreal.
In Villarreal Villarreal attack through Carlos Bacca. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 83, Goal kick for Valencia at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Jason is replacing Yunus Musah for the away team.
In the minute 84, Gabriel Paulista is booked for the away team.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a throw-in for Valencia, close to Villarreal's area.
Valencia make their third substitution with Uros Racic replacing Daniel Wass.
In the minute 86, Javi Gracia (Valencia) is making a fourth substitution, with Kevin Gameiro replacing Thierry Correia.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Valencia's Uros Racic misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 87, Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Villarreal a goal kick.
Throw-in for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Corner awarded to Valencia.
Gabriel Paulista (Valencia) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Villarreal goal kick.
Valencia have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Villarreal.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Villarreal.
Valencia drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In Villarreal Villarreal drive forward through Vicente Iborra. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Villarreal goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
The away team have replaced Goncalo Guedes with Manu Vallejo. This is the fifth substitution made today by Javi Gracia.
Takefusa Kubo (Villarreal) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
Unai Emery is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio de la Ceramica with Jaume Costa replacing Dani Parejo.
